text: Gennady Borisovich Bekoyev (; born 1981) is a South Ossetian politician. He is the 16th Prime Minister of South Ossetia. Bekoyev was appointed to the position following the dismissal of Erik Pukhayev by President Anatoly Bibilov. Bekoyev is an independent. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of South Ossetia
title: Gennady Bekoyev
